allowlistReasons.src/app/globals.css: CSS design tokens and property names (e.g., 'order', 'border', 'oklch') are benign style tokens and may trigger conservative PI pattern matches.
allowlistReasons.src/lib/design-tokens.ts: Design token keys and example strings (e.g., 'border-*') are semantic tokens, not transaction/order identifiers.
allowlistReasons.docs/: Documentation includes example emails and placeholders which are expected and safe.
Test documentation containing example phone numbers (e.g., 5551234567) for PII scanner validation purposes.
allowlistReasons.docs/ai/logging-security.md: AI logging/security documentation references proprietary terminology for classification examples and is expected in this context.
